<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Hold down the skill key to charge it up. Press a directional key to move <font color='#00aaef'>1.5</font> m at tier 1, and <font color='#00aaef'>2.5</font> m at tier 2.

Tier 1 deals <font color='#00aaef'>837%</font> damage within the area.

Tier 2 deals <font color='#00aaef'>923%</font> damage within the area and ignites the earth.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Ignited area deals <font color='#00aaef'>491%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> times.

11000281|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
Momentarily take a counterattacking stance.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
If struck in melee, deals <font color='#00aaef'>240%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> times.

If struck at range,  deals <font color='#00aaef'>480%</font> damage.

Increases physical and magic resistance by <font color='#00aaef'>1200</font> and grants counterattack immunity.

Permanently increases kick skill damage by <font color='#00aaef'>3%</font> per skill level.



<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
After a successful counterattack, gain Confidence, increasing attack speed by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> and physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>.
Kick skills include Setup Kick, Spin Kick, Spin Kick EX, Spiral Cannon, Spiral Cannon EX, Melee Fade, and Ranged Fade.

11100061|1-SoulBinder-.uiDescription:

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>

Hold down the skill key to create multiple cores.

11100062|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
Harness your animus to create a purer form of Mantra Core.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Increases intelligence by <font color='#00aaef'>40</font>.
Create up to <font color='#00aaef'>2</font>.
Grants <font color='#f06d45'>Awakened Mantra Core</font>, and restores <font color='#00aaef'>50</font> spirit.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Awakened Mantra Cores empower Expansion Blast, Spirit Crush, Soul Shield, and Soul Harmony.

11100062|1-JobChange_02-.uiDescription:

Your blows gain strength as your enemies draw close to death.

Attack an enemy with less than <font color='#00aaef'>50%</font> health to gain the Blood Fury effect.

10200231|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
Become a spinning vortex of death.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Deal <font color='#00aaef'>96%</font> damage per hit. Stand still to gain stacks of Gale; at <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> stacks, gain Whirlwind.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Gale increases attack speed by <font color='#00aaef'>4%</font> per stack.
While Whirlwind is active, hold down the skill key to increase spin speed and hit count, decrease movement speed to <font color='#00aaef'>30</font>, decrease damage to <font color='#00aaef'>56%</font>, gain knockback immunity, and deal an additional <font color='#00aaef'>38%</font> damage to enemies with Heavy Bleeding.
When Dark Might is active, Squall gains the same effects as Whirlwind with no movement penalty.

10200261|1-JobChange_02-.uiDescription:
Bolster your combat prowess when the tide is against you.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Triggers Death Rattle when one of the following conditions is met: You use a skill that consumes Dark Aura while it is at <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> stacks, you are surrounded by <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> or more enemies, or your health is reduced to <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> or below.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Death Rattle has <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> tiers. Each tier increases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>2%</font> and physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3.5%</font> each. Can only trigger once per <font color='#00aaef'>5.2</font> sec.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Triggers Death Rattle when one of the following conditions is met: You use a skill that consumes Dark Aura while it is at <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> stacks, you are surrounded by <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> or more enemies, or your health is reduced to <font color='#00aaef'>60%</font> or below.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Death Rattle has <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> tiers. Each tier increases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>2%</font> and physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>3.5%</font> each. Can only trigger once per <font color='#00aaef'>2.1</font> sec.

10300241|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
You've befriended a mischievous fire spirit.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Permanently grants Dancing Flames. Casting Flame Tornado temporarily grants Flame Imp.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Dancing Flames removes the spirit cost of Flame Wave and increases Flame Tornado damage by <font color='#00aaef'>111%</font>.

Flame Imp lasts for <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> sec, guaranteeing a critical when Ember hits and granting a <font color='#00aaef'>22%</font> chance to trigger Party Time on critical hit.
Party Time resets Barbeque Party's cooldown and allows it to be cast instantly.

Permanently grants Dancing Flames. Casting Flame Tornado temporarily grants Flame Imp.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Dancing Flames removes the spirit cost of Flame Wave and increases Flame Tornado damage by <font color='#00aaef'>150%</font>.

Flame Imp lasts for <font color='#00aaef'>11.5</font> sec, guaranteeing a critical when Ember hits and granting a <font color='#00aaef'>30%</font> chance to trigger Party Time on critical hit.
Party Time resets Barbeque Party's cooldown and allows it to be cast instantly.

10300261|1-JobChange_02-.uiDescription:
Summon ice spirits to enhance your ice magic.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>

10300281|1-JobChange_02-.uiDescription:
Harness the power of synergistic fire magic by casting certain skills in succession.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Grants Perfect Combustion when Flame Wave, Ember, and Barbecue Party strike the same target within <font color='#00aaef'>5</font> sec.
Grants Extinguish when Perfect Combustion ends.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Perfect Combustion increases physical & magic attack of fire skills by <font color='#00aaef'>22%</font>, empowers Arcane Blast to deal double damage, and grants Extinguish.
Extinguish prevents Perfect Combustion from triggering for <font color='#00aaef'>28</font> sec.

10500231|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
Master the secrets of archery to unlock hidden skills and strengthen physical ability.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Available while $skill:10500233$ is active. Increases piercing by <font color='#00aaef'>1%</font> and accuracy by <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>20</font> sec. Enables use of $skill:10500243$ and $skill:10500221$. Once learned, unlocks Wind Draw and $skill:10500233$.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Hit enemies with Piercing Arrow and Spiral Arrow to gain Wind Draw, which lasts for <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> sec and stacks up to <font color='#00aaef'>15</font> times. At max stacks, gain $skill:10500233$.
$skill:10500233$ enables $skill:10500231$ for <font color='#00aaef'>30</font> sec.

10500291|1-JobChange_02-.uiDescription:
Calls the Eagle Squad.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Grants the Captain Eagle effect to you and any other nearby Archers who know Eagle Squad. This increases physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>6%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> sec and turns the Enhanced Eagle Glide skill into Captain Glide. After the effect ends, you can't receive the Captain Eagle effect again for <font color='#00aaef'>120</font> sec.

Grants knockback immunity while casting skill.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Grants Eagle Squad to nearby allies, increasing physical and magic attack by <font color='#00aaef'>2%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>40</font> sec. After the effect ends, allies can't receive the Eagle Squad effect again for <font color='#00aaef'>120</font> sec.

10700191|1-JobChange_01-.uiDescription:
Tailor your strategy to any situation.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Passively grants Watchful.

When manually activated, cancels Watchful and grants Rush effect.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
Watchful increases defense by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font>.
Rush increases physical attack by <font color='#00aaef'>29%</font> and movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>10%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>8</font> sec.
Rush and Haste do not stack.

Inflicts an Assassin's Insignia every <font color='#00aaef'>0.5</font> sec.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font>
